synopsis.text: Despite their reputation as enchanting and mystical creatures who captivate sailors, mermaids face everyday challenges just like anyone else. In the serene village of Parrel, five young mermaids - Canon, Caro, Fina, Serena, and Sonata - lead cheerful and lively lives under the sea. Whether they're squabbling over snack cakes or embarking on new adventures to explore their breathtaking water world, these friends support each other through every problem they encounter. But when the glittering lights of the big city beckon, these mermaids must strive their hardest to become idols who can dance and sing with bright smiles. Follow the delightful daily lives of these mermaids as they navigate the world beneath the waves and discover what it takes to become a true idol in this spin-off anime to Bushiroad's "Cardfight!!! Vanguard" franchise.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
